Author: MissNietzsche
Text: My boyfriend left me two months ago, and all I can do to numb the pain is binge :( it’s horrible

Author: polyamorys
Text: relationships whilst struggling with disordered eating is really hard. sometimes when my boyfriend is upset at me it’ll encourage me to avoid eating because it feels like that will “solve” things or appease him. honestly though, in my experience, communication of the problems/fights is what helps me. if we can communicate about the fight and do it in a really open way, it means i’m a lot less likely to feel terrible about hurting my boyfriend - or him saying something to have hurt me, because i can get clarification or reassurance on what he said - so i’m less likely to avoid food.  look after yourself! i know it sucks, but just make sure you’re safe.
